question: The Cabinet Committee on Economic Affairs (CCEA) has approved a scheme for the industrial development of which state/UT?
explanation:
The Cabinet Committee on Economic Affairs (CCEA) has approved a scheme for the industrial development of Jammu & Kashmir.
The Department for Promotion of Industry and Internal Trade (DPIIT) had proposed for a Central Sector scheme. It has now been approved with a total outlay of Rs 28,400 crore for 17 years, up to the year 2037.
